languages.text: "Как может погубить что-то столь праведное, как мой гнев! И почему ты вдруг хочешь остановить меня, Вольный Торговец? Разве ты не {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFury}поддерживал{mf||а}{/d} меня в праве на ярость?!"

traits.locale_text: "Как может погубить что-то столь праведное, как мой гнев! И почему ты вдруг хочешь остановить меня, Вольный Торговец? Разве ты не поддерживал{mf||а} меня в праве на ярость?!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Why fear something as righteous as my anger? And why are you so suddenly trying to hold me back, Rogue Trader? Did you not {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFury}support{/d} me in my right to wield my fury before?"
languages.original_text: "Как может погубить что-то столь праведное, как мой гнев! И почему ты вдруг хочешь остановить меня, Вольный Торговец? Разве ты не {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFury}поддерживал{mf||а}{/d} меня в праве на ярость?!"

traits.locale_text: "Why fear something as righteous as my anger? And why are you so suddenly trying to hold me back, Rogue Trader? Did you not support me in my right to wield my fury before?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why fear something as righteous as my anger? And why are you so suddenly trying to hold me back, Rogue Trader? Did you not support me in my right to wield my fury before?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why fear something as righteous as my anger? And why are you so suddenly trying to hold me back, Rogue Trader? Did you not support me in my right to wield my fury before?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why fear something as righteous as my anger? And why are you so suddenly trying to hold me back, Rogue Trader? Did you not support me in my right to wield my fury before?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why fear something as righteous as my anger? And why are you so suddenly trying to hold me back, Rogue Trader? Did you not {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFury}support{/d} me in my right to wield my fury before?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「なぜ我の怒りのように公正なるものを恐れる？そして、なぜ急に我を引き止めようとするのだ、自由開拓者？以前、我の怒りを使う権利を{d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFury}支持{/d}してくれたのではないのか？」
languages.original_text: "Why fear something as righteous as my anger? And why are you so suddenly trying to hold me back, Rogue Trader? Did you not {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFury}support{/d} me in my right to wield my fury before?"

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ我の怒りのように公正なるものを恐れる？そして、なぜ急に我を引き止めようとするのだ、自由開拓者？以前、我の怒りを使う権利を{d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFury}支持{/d}してくれたのではないのか？」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “为什么要惧怕我正义的怒火呢？你为什么突然打算阻止我，行商浪人？你之前不是一直{d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFury}支持{/d}我行使愤怒的权利吗？”
languages.original_text: "Why fear something as righteous as my anger? And why are you so suddenly trying to hold me back, Rogue Trader? Did you not {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFury}support{/d} me in my right to wield my fury before?"

traits.locale_text: “为什么要惧怕我正义的怒火呢？你为什么突然打算阻止我，行商浪人？你之前不是一直支持我行使愤怒的权利吗？”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « À quoi bon craindre quelque chose d'aussi vertueux que ma sainte colère ? Et pourquoi cherchez-vous subitement à me retenir, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? Jusqu'à présent, vous m'avez toujours {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFury}soutenue{/d} dans ma croisade. »
languages.original_text: "Why fear something as righteous as my anger? And why are you so suddenly trying to hold me back, Rogue Trader? Did you not {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFury}support{/d} me in my right to wield my fury before?"

traits.locale_text: « À quoi bon craindre quelque chose d'aussi vertueux que ma sainte colère ? Et pourquoi cherchez-vous subitement à me retenir, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? Jusqu'à présent, vous m'avez toujours soutenue dans ma croisade. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Por qué teme algo tan justo como mi cólera? ¿Y por qué intenta contenerme, Comerciante Independiente? ¿Acaso no me {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFury}apoyó{/d} a la hora de desatar mi furia antes?».
languages.original_text: "Why fear something as righteous as my anger? And why are you so suddenly trying to hold me back, Rogue Trader? Did you not {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFury}support{/d} me in my right to wield my fury before?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué teme algo tan justo como mi cólera? ¿Y por qué intenta contenerme, Comerciante Independiente? ¿Acaso no me apoyó a la hora de desatar mi furia antes?».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Warum fürchtet Ihr etwas so Rechtschaffenes wie meine Wut? Und warum versucht Ihr plötzlich, mich zurückzuhalten, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}? Habt Ihr nicht bisher mein Recht auf Wut {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFury}unterstützt{/d} ?"
languages.original_text: "Why fear something as righteous as my anger? And why are you so suddenly trying to hold me back, Rogue Trader? Did you not {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFury}support{/d} me in my right to wield my fury before?"

traits.locale_text: "Warum fürchtet Ihr etwas so Rechtschaffenes wie meine Wut? Und warum versucht Ihr plötzlich, mich zurückzuhalten, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}? Habt Ihr nicht bisher mein Recht auf Wut unterstützt?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Öfkem gibi hakkaniyetli bir şeyden neden sakınıyorsun? Neden durduk yere bana köstek olmaya çalışıyorsun Hür Tacir? Öfkemi ustalıkla kullanmamı {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFury}destekleyen{/d} de bizzat sen değil miydin?"
languages.original_text: "Why fear something as righteous as my anger? And why are you so suddenly trying to hold me back, Rogue Trader? Did you not {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFury}support{/d} me in my right to wield my fury before?"

traits.locale_text: "Öfkem kadar hakkaniyetli bir şeyden neden sakınıyorsun? Neden durduk yere bana köstek olmaya çalışıyorsun Hür Tacir? Öfkemi ustalıkla kullanmamı {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFury}destekleyen{/d} de bizzat sen değil miydin?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
